questions.question: A liquid does not wet the surface of a solid if the angle of contact is:
Water is flowing at 12 m/s in a horizontal pipe. If the pipe widens to twice its original diameter, the flow speed in the wider section is:
Which of the following is true about the Hydrostatic law?
The working of hydraulic system is on the which of the following principle:
Water rises to height ‘h’ in capillary tube. If the length of capillary tube above the surface of water is made less than ‘h’, then:
options: water does not rise at all
water rises up the tip of capillary tube and then starts overflowing like a fountain
water rises up the top of capillary tube and stays there without overflowing
water rises upto a point a little below the top and stays there
questions.answer: water rises upto a point a little below the top and stays there

questions.question: A soap bubble in vacuum has a radius of 3 cm and another soap bubble in vacuum has a radius of 4 cm. If the two bubbles coalesce under isothermal condition, then the radius of the new bubble is:
A false statement is:
options: Angle of contact 0 < 90°, if cohesive force < adhesive force
Angle of contact 0 > 90°, if cohesive force > adhesive force
Angle of contact 0 = 90°, cohesive force = adhesive force
If the radius of capillary is reduced 1/2, the rise of liquid column becomes four times
questions.answer: If the radius of capillary is reduced 1/2, the rise of liquid column becomes four times

questions.question: An house door has a dimension of 3 m² due to the heavy rains the outside air pressure decreases to 0.96 atm but the inside pressure is 1.0 atmosphere. How much force is required to open the house door?
With the rise in temperature, surface tension:
Which of the following statements is true?
options: Surface tension of hot water is more than that of cold water
Surface tension of hot water is less than that of cold water
Surface tension of soap water is more than pure water
Surface tension of liquid is independent of temperature
questions.answer: Surface tension of hot water is less than that of cold water

questions.question: Water is flowing with velocity 45 cm/sec in a cylinder of diameter 8 cm. It is connected to a pipe with its end tip of diameter 2 cm. Calculate the velocity of water at this free end at one atmosphere:
